title: 关于MInecraft启动代码需要额外程序的问题
txt_content:
点击展开代码

@echo off 
set appdata=C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop	est\.minecraft
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_121 in\javaw.exe" -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSIncrementalMode -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx3072m -Djava.library.path=C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop	est\.minecraft\versions\1.9forge\1.9forge-natives -Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true -Dfml.ignorePatchDiscrepancies=true -Dhellominecraftlauncher.gamedir=C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop	est\.minecraft -cp /C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/test/WIN启动器.exe;/C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/test/lib/gson-2.2.4.jar;/C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/test/lib/MetroLookAndFeel.jar;/C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/test/lib/HMCLAPI.jar org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher -cp=C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop	est\.minecraft\libraries

以上这段代码,必须要一个名为Win启动器的程序才能正常启动游戏  哪位大佬帮忙改动一下放弃那个程序
单独bat就能启动
可以红包答谢
